title: Jordan Peterson and Stephen Fry Commentary: Psalm 1 Tree Planted by the River vs Chaff
description:
Don't have nearly 4 hours to watch? Read the Substack Summary https://paulvanderklay.substack.com/p/jordan-peterson-stephen-fry-and-psalm

After this dropped I immediately started getting requests for a commentary on this. Peterson and Fry were teamed together at the Munk debates on political correctness but in many ways Fry is a fearsome apologist for atheism, far better informed than the other celebrity atheists especially on the literary front. It made for a good conversation. 

@Jordan B Peterson https://youtu.be/fFFSKedy9f4
The Rest is History Podcast Aztecs The Rest is History Ep 51 Aztecs https://pca.st/nvwht5ty
The Fifth Sun a New History of the Aztecs https://amzn.to/3oBn1uc
George Gallup The Saints Among Us https://amzn.to/33V1HGn

Discord link. Good for just a few days. Check with more recent videos for a fresh link. https://discord.gg/2MdXZC5x
